screening_page.introduction: My name is [Name] from Research Co. We're talking to people about their opinions about certain products, and I'd like to ask you a few questions.

questions.question: In the past week or two, have you spent any time looking through or reading a magazine or newspaper at home?
Do you usually smoke King-Size cigarettes or longer than King-size, that is the 100 millimeter or 120 millimeter size?
Do you usually smoke a Menthol or a Non-Menthol cigarette?

answers.menthol: GO TO BACK SIDE OF SCREENER

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes, the brand you smoke most often?
questions.instruction: RECORD BELOW, SHOW BRAND LIST TO DETERMINE WHICH VERSION AND LETTERS
questions.note: IF BRAND HAS NO LETTERS NEXT TO IT THANK AND TERMINATE

screening_page.invitation: TELL RESPONDENT THAT WE HAVE SOME ADS WE'D LIKE HIM/HER TO LOOK AT AND INVITE INTO INTERVIEW ROOM
